<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare consists of a flat rock or metal plate held in place with a spring or flexible branch. When triggered, the flat object swings wide and smacks the triggering creature violently. The first creature to enter its square receives 2d6 bludgeoning damage (DC 16 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a critical failure, the creature is also [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
